transcript: Of course I'm gonna wait. I just... I just don't like the idea of this happening. I mean, because this is the last time this is gonna happen. You're gonna go on more tours and stuff. I just... I can't.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Of course I'm going to wait.  I just- I just don't like the idea of this happening because this isn't the last time this is going to happen. You're going to go on more tours and stuff.  I just- I can't-
